content: i am making these cute little pouch bags and filling them with mini easter eggs to give as small gifts this year they will look lovely on the easter table requirements dk yarn ~ i used 4 colours but you could vary this 5mm crochet hook ~ if you prefer you can use a 4mm hook mini eggs to fill size when flat before filling width 8 all around 20cm height 5½ 14cm instructions this pattern is written in uk terminology treble_crochet = treble_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet chain = chain **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓** please remember ~ these are not suitable for small children as they could be a choking hazard quick and easy to make - and they look delightful
